cab.content: 1192From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of Stale for India,Ath December 1919.(Repealed to Tehran, Baghdad, Constantinople, Tiflis, Kasvin and Vladivostok.)(Received 5tli.)16287. -lib December. Mallesoii telegraphs following' dated 2nd December : 1. From frontier reports Bolsheviks now have 15,000 troops on Kizil Arvat frontand expect more daily.2. All reports agree Bolsheviks consider capture of Krasnovodsk vital as railways,everywhere breaking down for want of lubricants and oil fuel. They count uponbeing joined by Caspian Fleet on reaching Krasnovodsk after which Bolshevik outbreakin Baku will follow. Bolsheviks are sending large numbers of agents and agitatorsto Baku and Persian Azerbaijan by various routes.,. 3. Bolsheviks expect first big army from centre in six weeks' lime.
